mapper.select:
SELECT info.*, category.`code` as category_code FROM t_product_info info LEFT JOIN t_product_category category ON info.product_type = category.id
ORDER BY info.create_time desc limit #{start},#{size}
SELECT count(1) FROM t_product_info info LEFT JOIN t_product_category category ON info.product_type = category.id

SELECT info.id, substring_index(info.image, ',', 1) as view_image, info.`name`, info.description, info.sales_volume, price.price, price.virtual_price FROM t_product_info info LEFT JOIN t_product_price price ON info.id = price.product_id where price.default_flag = '0' and info.state = '0' ORDER BY info.sales_volume desc limit #{start},#{size}

SELECT info.id, substring_index(info.image, ',', 1) as view_image, info.`name`, info.description, info.sales_volume, price.price, price.virtual_price FROM t_ads_product ads LEFT JOIN t_product_info info on ads.product_id = info.id LEFT JOIN t_product_price price ON ads.product_id = price.product_id where price.default_flag = '0' and info.state = '0' and ads.ads_id = #{adsId} ORDER BY info.sales_volume desc limit #{start},#{size}
